notes: Cats are harmless straying animals. New creature in the [[Updates/8.1|8.1 Update]] they seem to be attached to monks.
name: Cat
bestiarytext: The Tibian Cats were bred from a huge, tiger-like species. It took many centuries and the help of alchemy and magic until the domestic Cat started to take shape. The first Cats that were small enough not to devour their owners were highly prized. For a long time, only the highest nobility could afford a Cat as a pet. In the following centuries wars, misfortunes and the  independent spirit of the Cats led to several escapes of this furry pet. In freedom, the Cats could rely on their old predatory instincts and though, they survived and prospered. Over the years, Cats became more and more common. Nowadays, it is not unusual that a farmer has one or two Cats on his property. Some loners even spend their lives on the city streets on their own. The Cats of the nobility are still highly prized and some pure breed can boast a more impressive and elaborate family tree than its owner.
behaviour: Follows you around, rather like a dog.
location: [[Carlin]], [[Rookgaard]], [[Factory Quarter]], [[Yalahar]], [[The Witches' Cliff]] (only accessible during a [[The Inquisition Quest|quest]]), probably more areas.
strategy: Not needed, dies with a single hit of most weapons, just fist it to yellow health if you don't want to kill it.
